summary_reasoning: This Morningstar report covers nearly all expected sections: cover/contents, Analyst Note, Business Description, Strategy & Outlook, Bulls/Bears, Economic Moat, Valuation & Profit Drivers, Risk & Uncertainty, Capital Allocation, a detailed multi‑year Financials Snapshot, ESG (with peer comparison), and peer benchmarking across Visa/Mastercard/Block. The depth is generally proportional, with sector-relevant KPIs discussed in the narrative (PayPal‑branded and Braintree volumes, transaction margin dollars, active accounts, transactions per account) and a robust valuation bridge (explicit revenue CAGR, margin trajectory, WACC/COE, DCF build). Evidence is consistently supported by internal tables and dated analyst notes; redundancy is limited to recurring themes (pivot to profitable growth) but each section adds incremental detail. The main gap is that the Financials Snapshot tables do not incorporate core payments KPIs (e.g., TPV, take rate, cohort/account metrics) even though the narrative references some of them; by the decision rules, missing ≥2 sector KPIs in the snapshot caps the grade. Scenario/sensitivity analysis is also absent. These gaps modestly constrain comprehensiveness despite otherwise strong coverage.

sections_missing: Sector KPI table within Financials Snapshot
